content.raw:
Update on mac osx status:

I can build successfully on osx with the following commands:
~~~
brew tap osrf/simulation
# robot_msgs --HEAD uses c++11 branch
brew install robot_msgs --HEAD
# need to run a second time due to weird behavior related to our custom protobuf formula
brew install robot_msgs --HEAD
brew install ignition-transport --HEAD
~~~

It has a few compiler warnings. Also the tests are failing. @caguero is looking into the failing tests.

There are also a few homebrew warnings on osx 10.8 that are resolved on 10.9. This is related to libstdc++ vs. libc++ and libc++ is required for c++11.
content.html:
Update on mac osx status:

I can build successfully on osx with the following commands:

brew tap osrf/simulation
# robot_msgs --HEAD uses c++11 branch
brew install robot_msgs --HEAD
# need to run a second time due to weird behavior related to our custom protobuf formula
brew install robot_msgs --HEAD
brew install ignition-transport --HEAD

It has a few compiler warnings. Also the tests are failing. @caguero is looking into the failing tests.

There are also a few homebrew warnings on osx 10.8 that are resolved on 10.9. This is related to libstdc++ vs. libc++ and libc++ is required for c++11.
